verses.name: Luke 5:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, that, as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God, he stood by the lake of Gennesaret,

verses.name: Luke 5:2
verses.text: And saw two ships standing by the lake: but the fishermen were gone out of them, and were washing their nets.

verses.name: Luke 5:3
verses.text: And he entered into one of the ships, which was Simon’s, and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land. And he sat down, and taught the people out of the ship.
